config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The DESTINATION_TYPE configuration is used to determine the type of destination for the conversion process in the code. It is used to set the transcoder to use for the operation and to compute the destination files from the computed sources.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The DESTINATION_TYPE configuration is triggered whenever the execute() method is called in the system. This method is called to start the conversion process, so the configuration is triggered whenever a conversion process is initiated.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the DESTINATION_TYPE configuration option is significant as it determines the type of destination for the conversion process. It affects which transcoder is used for the operation and how the destination files are computed. Choosing the correct destination type is crucial for the success of the conversion process.
